label: recommendedCrops
comment: The top recommended crops that can be cultivated for the season as suggested by the advisory entity.

label: recommendedCropVariety
comment: The top recommended crop varieties that can be cultivated for the season as suggested by the advisory entity.

label: recommendingAuthority
comment: Provides guidance and suggestions on agricultural practices, techniques, and decisions to enhance productivity and sustainability.

label: landExtent
comment: Area of the land corresponding to this observation.

label: landIdentityInfo
comment: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: soilClass
comment: The soil class may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

label: soilCategory
comment: The soil category may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

label: validFrom
comment: The instance from which an official report/document or consent or service corresponding to this observation is valid.

label: validTill
comment: The specific period of time during which a document, authorization, offer or permission remains legally or effectively acceptable/applicable.
